title: Malum: The Ballad of Darane: Book 5
description: Evil takes form, as faceless monsters are reborn. Hope slips ever further from reach.The teachings of Aerokin talk of evil which will infect and consume everything it touches - and of a woman with the power to save or condemn all.The Ballad of Darane chronicles the journey of a woman with a destiny and power she does not understand or want, as she struggles to cope with the brutality of the world she inhabits.
author: Tir Cey
